1.name: Dong Zhuo Deposes the Emperor
1.subtitle: Luoyang in Flames
1.description: Dong Zhuo deposes the young emperor, enthrones Emperor Xian, and moves the capital to Chang'an. Warlords across the land rise up against him.

2.name: Warlords Vie for the Central Plains
2.subtitle: Cao Cao's Expansion
2.description: Cao Cao secures Yan Province, Lu Bu seizes Xu Province, Liu Bei stations at Xiapi, and Sun Ce rises in the Jiangdong region.

3.name: Battle of Guandu
3.subtitle: Struggle for Hebei
3.description: Yuan Shao destroys Gongsun Zan, unifies Hebei, and plans to march south. Cao Cao wields the emperor's authority and faces Yuan Shao at Guandu.

4.name: Battle of Red Cliffs
4.subtitle: The Sleeping Dragon Awakens
4.description: Cao Cao unifies the north and leads a great army southward. Liu Bei recruits Zhuge Liang and allies with Eastern Wu against Cao Cao.

5.name: Three Kingdoms Established
5.subtitle: King of Hanzhong
5.description: Liu Bei captures Hanzhong and becomes King of Hanzhong. Guan Yu floods the Seven Armies, shaking all of China. Sun Quan seizes Jing Province.

6.name: Star Falls at Wuzhang Plains
6.subtitle: Zhuge Liang's Final Campaign
6.description: Zhuge Liang launches his sixth northern expedition, facing Sima Yi at the Wuzhang Plains. The Prime Minister of Shu Han falls ill and passes away.
